title: BBC Women's Football Weekly
body_text:
Episode details
Radio 5 Live,27 Jan 2026,40 mins
Manchester City extend lead & Champions Cup debate
BBC Women's Football WeeklyAvailable for 11 days
Ben Haines, Ellen White and Jen Beattie discuss whether the title is now City's after Chelsea lost to Arsenal. Is there a way back for Sonia Bompastor's side? There were lots of special guests at the London City Lionesses match including Spanish star Alexia Putellas. Could a move to the WSL be on the cards for the Barcelona player? It's getting interesting down the bottom of the table with Liverpool and West Ham both winning, but Everton suffered their sixth consecutive home defeat in the league. Plus the team debate the Fifa Champions Cup with an ever growing fixture list. Timecodes: 01:00 Jen makes Haggis! 03:00 Is the title City's? 07:00 London City clicking & Godfrey goal 08:35 Alex Greenwood at centre-half? 10:25 Chelsea find a way back? 13:30 Arsenal & Beth Mead 18:30 Alexia Putellas at LCL 26:40 Liverpool & Everton 30:45 Trinity Rodman 32:45 Champions Cup
